column5: My son's girlfriend gave me a Lifestraw for Christmas so I decided to drink the Wab in the boat. I found it most refreshing and the water tasted great! Recommend highly! http://lifestraw.com/products/lifestraw-go/

We fished Lac Doda in Quebec and somehow left all of our water and most beer at the dock to come in later in the weekMy friend always had a water filter but this trip we needed to use itThe water tasted excellent and when the bottled water showed up on Tuesday it tasted like sh@t compared to the filtered lake waterRedSent from my iPad using Tapatalk
